headline: Eaton Reports Record Fourth Quarter 2025 Results, with Accelerating Orders and Continued Backlog Growth, and Issues Guidance on 2026 Outlook
summary: DUBLIN, February 03, 2026--Intelligent power management company Eaton Corporation plc (NYSE:ETN) today announced that fourth quarter 2025 earnings per share were $2.91, a fourth quarter record. Excluding charges of $0.25 per share related to intangible amortization, $0.10 per share related to acquisitions and divestitures, and $0.07 per share related to a multi-year restructuring program, adjusted earnings per share of $3.33 were a record.

content.title: Eaton Reports Record Fourth Quarter 2025 Results, with Accelerating Orders and Continued Backlog Growth, and Issues Guidance on 2026 Outlook
content.summary: DUBLIN, February 03, 2026--Intelligent power management company Eaton Corporation plc (NYSE:ETN) today announced that fourth quarter 2025 earnings per share were $2.91, a fourth quarter record. Excluding charges of $0.25 per share related to intangible amortization, $0.10 per share related to acquisitions and divestitures, and $0.07 per share related to a multi-year restructuring program, adjusted earnings per share of $3.33 were a record.
